The cost of a 7-night package deal to Bangkok can vary greatly depending on several factors such as the time of year, accommodation options, and the type of guided tour to Ayutthaya. However, I can provide some general estimates to give you an idea of what to expect.

A 7-night package deal to Bangkok can range from budget-friendly options to luxury getaways. Here are some rough estimates:

**Budget-friendly options (3-star accommodations):**

* Package cost: $800-$1,200 per person
* Accommodation: 3-star hotel in Bangkok (avg. $30-50 per night)
* Ayutthaya guided tour: $60-$80 per person (half-day tour)
* Flights: $400-$600 per person (depending on the airline and time of booking)

**Mid-range options (4-star accommodations):**

* Package cost: $1,200-$1,800 per person
* Accommodation: 4-star hotel in Bangkok (avg. $60-80 per night)
* Ayutthaya guided tour: $80-$120 per person (full-day tour)
* Flights: $500-$800 per person (depending on the airline and time of booking)

**Luxury options (5-star accommodations):**

* Package cost: $2,500-$3,500 per person
* Accommodation: 5-star hotel in Bangkok (avg. $150-200 per night)
* Ayutthaya guided tour: $150-$200 per person (private guide and transportation)
* Flights: $800-$1,200 per person (depending on the airline and time of booking)

Keep in mind that these are rough estimates, and prices can vary depending on the time of year, availability, and other factors.

When searching for a package deal, look for offers that include:

* Round-trip flights from your preferred airport to Bangkok
* Accommodation in a hotel that suits your budget and preferences
* A guided tour to Ayutthaya (half-day or full-day, depending on your interests)
* Airport transfers and transportation between destinations
* Optional activities or excursions (e.g., floating markets, cooking classes, or temple visits)

Remember to carefully review the itinerary, inclusions, and exclusions before booking a package deal. It's also a good idea to compare prices across different travel agencies and online travel agencies (OTAs) to find the best option for your needs and budget.
